Question: In 2003, this person was denied permission to make a video for "Couch Potato", his parody of Eminem's "Lose Yourself":.
Hints: In 2006, this person gained James Blunt's permission to record a parody of "You're Beautiful".
This person also appeared on the Wendy Carlos recording of Prokofiev's "Peter and the Wolf" as the narrator in 1988.
Levey asked this person if he had considered creating a full band and doing his music as a career.
